Instance.description: A drama node that has information about running a holiday.

Tunable.name: holiday
Tunable.description: The holiday that this drama node starts.

TunableTuple.name: pre_holiday_duration
TunableTuple.description: This duration is used to calculate the drama node's start time for main holidays by subtracting the tuned amount from the globally tuned start time. The player is notified with a reminder for the holiday, and decorations will be put up in the neighborhood. For surprise holidays, this should be set to 0, as surprise holidays have no pre-holiday state.

TdescFragTag.name: tests_to_create_situation
TdescFragTag.description: Tests that must pass for the holiday situation to be created on the target sim.
